text: TPV Technology Limited (informally TPV, ) is a Chinese electronics company. It is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong and incorporated in Bermuda. It designs and produces CRT and TFT LCD monitors and LCD TVs. TPV owns brands like AOC, Envision, and Philips for some products. It is also an original design manufacturer for other companies. It is the worldâ€™s largest manufacturer of computer monitors with a 33% market share. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Electronics companies of China Category:Companies of Hong Kong
title: TPV Technology
